title: Gather Claude Code Information
description: Research and gather comprehensive information about Claude Code (Anthropic's official CLI tool) from web sources. Create structured markdown files with current information about features, capabilities, installation, usage, and best practices. Focus on official documentation, recent updates, and practical implementation details.
requirements: Use web search to find current information about Claude Code
Gather information from official Anthropic sources
Include installation instructions and system requirements
Find usage examples and best practices
Create well-structured markdown files with the research
expected_output:
Multiple markdown files (.md) containing:
- claude_code_overview.md (general information and features)
- claude_code_installation.md (installation and setup)
- claude_code_usage.md (usage examples and best practices)
- claude_code_updates.md (recent updates and news)

Each file should be well-structured with proper headings, bullet points, and source citations.
